detailed_results.input: My mother Thetis tells me that there are two ways in which I [Achilles] may meet my end. If I stay here and fight, I shall not return alive but my name will live for ever:
detailed_results.reasoning: Coalition/agent is wrong (gold attributes the guarantee to Achilles, prediction to Thetis). Temporal structure is missing (gold has G over the implication). The condition is weakened (gold requires stay_here && fight; prediction only fight). The consequent differs (gold uses die && name-lives; prediction uses !alive && name_lives, and also omits the 'shall not return alive' nuance tied to staying and fighting under G).
